content:
Dron Kamikadze with a two-kilogram fugas flew directly into the shelter of Russian drones. They were hiding in the basement, but the fighters of 47 brigades got them there. After such a meeting, it is unlikely that they survived.

The border guards of the Revenge brigade also showed their work - in the Bakhmut direction, they eliminated two invaders with the help of drones, and five more were injured.

In the Avdeevsky direction, the fighters of the Shadow unit are beautifully destroying the Russian tank. After the first discharge of the grenade inside the tank, the fuel spilled. The second pomegranate punched the bottom of the tank, the third - lit Russian scrap.

The Armed Forces fighters showed videos how the occupiers of managed airbams destroy the village of Terny. This village is located in the Liman direction and controlled by Ukraine.

The SBU detained the FSB saboteurs who tried to undermine the rail line in Poltava.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergey Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: Destruction of the Droshchiers of Russian, bombing of thorns, SBU against FSB agents: Star from the frontier city
description: The border guards of the Revenge brigade - in the Bakhmut direction they were also shown their work by ...
author: Army Inform
